name: Verbs: Simple Present
note: You speak English / Does he speak English? / He does not speak English

name: Verbs: Present Continuous
note: am/is/are + present participle (You are watching TV / Are you watching TV? / You are not watching TV.)

name: Verbs: Simple Past
note: verb + ed (You called Debbie / Did you call Debbie? / You did not call Debbie.)

name: Verbs: Past Continuous
note: was/were + present participle (You were studying when she called  / Were you studying when she called? / You were not studying when she called.)

name: Verbs: Present Perfect
note: has/have + past participle (You have seen that movie many times. / Have you seen that movie many times? / You have not seen that movie many times.)

name: Verbs: Present Perfect Continuous
note: has/have + been + present participle (You have been waiting here for two hours. / Have you been waiting here for two hours? / You have not been waiting here for two hours.)

name: Verbs: Past Perfect
note: had + past participle (You had studied English before you moved to New York. / Had you studied English before you moved to New York? / You had not studied English before you moved to New York.)

name: Verbs: Past Perfect Continuous
note: had + been + present participle (You had been waiting there for more than two hours when she finally arrived. / Had you been waiting there for more than two hours when she finally arrived? / You had not been waiting there for more than two hours when she finally arrived.)

name: Verbs: Simple Future
note: will + VERB / am/is/are + going to + VERB

name: Verbs: Future Continuous
note: will be + present participle / am/is/are + going to be + present participle

name: Verbs: Future Perfect
note: will have + past participle / am/is/are + going to have + past participle

name: Verbs: Future Perfect Continuous
note: will have been + present participle / am/is/are + going to have been + present participle

name: Verbs: Used To
note: used to + VERB

name: Verbs: Would Always
note: would always (constantly, often, forever, rarely, occasionally, seldom) + VERB

name: Verbs: Future in the Past
note: would + VERB / was/were + going to + VERB

name: Conditional: Present Real (0-form)
note: If / When ... simple present ..., ... simple present ... | ... simple present ... if / when ... simple present ...

name: Conditional: Present Unreal (2-form)
note: If ... simple past ..., ... would + verb ... | ... would + verb ... if ... simple past ...

name: Conditional: Past Real
note: If / When ... simple past ..., ... simple past ... | ... simple past... if / when ... simple past ...

name: Conditional: Past Unreal (3-form)
note: If ... past perfect ..., ... would have + past participle ... | ... would have + past participle ... if ... past perfect ...

name: Conditional: Future Real (1-form)
note: If / When ... simple present ..., ... simple future ... | ... simple future ... if / when ... simple present ...

name: Conditional: Future Unreal (var 1, looks like Present Unreal)
note: If ... simple past ..., ... would + verb ... | ... would + verb ... if ... simple past ...

name: Conditional: Future Unreal (var 2)
note: If ... were + present participle ..., ... would be + present participle ... | ... would be + present participle ... if ... were + present participle ...

name: Conditional: Future Unreal (var 3, emphasize plans)
note: If ... were going to + verb ..., ... would be + present participle ... | ... would be + present participle ... if ... were going to + verb ...
